A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I enjoyed VII.  It felt like a return to form for Star Wars.  Even though the story was very similar to IV\, it still set up VIII to be an interesting story.  In the prequels\, even though they were pretty bad\, I never left the theater disappointed.  This is the first Star Wars movie that\, when it was over\, I felt let down. Hopefully JJ can save the trilogy\, and I'm glad he's doing IX\, but Rian should be fired and a restraining order put on him by the Star Wars Franchise.
